data.title: Chris Coghill Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Chris Coghill on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Chris Coghill including 24 Hour Party People, Surge, and more.
data.text:
The Charming Man

Jack Taylor, the charismatic young singer of a local band, Rule 7, is found dead in his apartment. DCI Lewis and DI Mayne soon discover that Jack had a fractious relationship with just about everyone he came into contact with, including his brother, Sam, and his on-again-off-again girlfriend Amy.

Episode 2

Belle considers a breast enhancement for professional development. Upon leaving her first consultation, she encounters Bambi again who is entering the world of prostitution via a very dodgy route. Worried for Bambi's safety, Belle introduces her to Stephanie (Cherie Lunghi) but Bambi opts to work independently. Worried that her job has taken over her life, Belle goes out on a limb and accepts a date from the persistent Alex. Despite a few embarrassing moments, all goes well - until Belle receives an urgent phone call from Bambi, who has found herself in a dangerous situation - with a client that she stole from Belle.

Episode 6

Mandy is pretending to be Ian's girlfriend to hide the fact that he's gay. But when she gets pregnant, the Maguires threaten him with castration if he doesn't marry their girl. Adult content with very strong language, violence and sexual scenes
